properties.name: Baguio City
properties.description: Posted by Theedgemedia Baguio City - Summer Capital of the Philippines and also known for it\'s Colleges, Student and Art Culture lifestyle. Part of the BLIST Metropolis with a population of almost half-a-million as of 2007. If you\'d like to open a Word 4u 2day distribution outlet, FM station or Media outlet here, please contact us

properties.name: Dumagete
properties.description: Posted by Theedgemedia Dumagete is within the top 100 most populated cities in the Philippines. We are currently working with some groups to set up The Word 4U 2day distribution outlets and an FM station.

properties.name: Kidapawan Affiliation
properties.description: Posted by Theedgemedia In process of affiliating with an fm station

properties.name: Metro Cagayan de Oro
properties.description: Posted by Theedgemedia Metro Cagayan de Oro is the 4th largest Metropolis in the Philippines with an estimated population of over 1,120,000 as of 2007. If you would like to set up a Word 4U 2day distribution outlet, and FM station or Media Center here, please contact us.

properties.name: Metro Cebu
properties.description: Posted by Theedgemedia Cebu is the 2nd largest Metropolis after Metro Manila with an estimated population of over 2,300,000. All FM frequencies here are taken, but if you believe you can help us get on here or just outside the metro area, help set up a Word 4U2day distribution outlet or set-up a Media Center, please contact us

properties.name: Metro Naga
properties.description: Posted by Theedgemedia Naga City - in the top 50 most populated Philippine cities, center of Metro Naga, the 8th largest Metropolis with an estimated population of over 685,000 as 2007. If you would like to help set up a Word 4U 2day distribution outlet, FM Station or Media center here, please contact us

properties.name: Puerto Princesa
properties.description: Posted by Theedgemedia

properties.name: Shepherd's Staff
properties.description: Posted by Theedgemedia  Shepherd\'s Staff is an official Distribution Outlet of Word 4U 2day. Located on the Ground Floor of Greenbelt 1 (closer to the entrance facing Legaspi St. near corner of Paseo de Roxas) Legaspi Village, Makati

properties.name: The Edge Media Head Office
properties.description: Posted by Theedgemedia The Edge Media Office in Makati: The Edge Radio main stream for affiliate distribution The Edge Netcast Studio for live audio/video webcasts The Word 4U 2day publication and distribution office The Edge Media Training center (The School of Edge) It is the headquarters of United Christian Broadcasters Initiative for Asia, an affiliate of UCB International

properties.name: The Edge Radio Davao 104.3FM
properties.description: Posted by Theedgemedia in Davao City - the 3rd largest Metropolis in the country with estimated population of over 2,000,000 as of 2007 - is our 1st Media Center in Mindanao It houses our FM Station and is the main Word 4U 2day Distribution Outlet for Mindanao that region. If you would like to help in any way with our current operations there or be a Word 4U distribution outlet, please contact our Davao office

properties.name: The Edge Radio Lucena 90.3FM
properties.description: Posted by Theedgemedia

properties.name: UCBIFA - The Edge Media HQ
properties.description: Posted by Theedgemedia UCBIFA/The Edge Media Headquarters is located in the heart of Makati and houses: - The Edge Radio stream for affiliate distribution - The Edge Netcast studios for live webcast - The Edge Media Training Center - The Word for You Today publication office go to our website for contact and more info
